title: $3100-3/2 East Hollywood House-Updated-Fenced Yard-Pet Ok
neighborhood: East Hollywood - East of I95- West of Federal Hwy
posting_body: ['Spacious 3 bedroom 2 bath modern single family home in the heart of the desirable city of Hollywood.', 'This pet friendly ($350 deposit) home features nice size bedrooms, stainless steel appliances, a huge fully fenced in yard with additional storage space and no HOA.', 'This beauty is close to shops, restaurants, close proximity to the beach and major expressways.', 'Rapid approval for a well-qualified tenant.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE – NOT SHORT TERM.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background and eviction check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 2.5 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
